nodes.text: Shahn was communications officer working for the Rebel Alliance under the command of Princess Leia Organa. He was part of the crew of the central Kerts-Bhrg generator during the project where they planned to hide the Alliance Fleet within the chromosphere of the Arbran sun. He received a warning from the base on Arbra that scanners had detected Imperial craft entering the quadrant, and relayed the warning to Leia.
The character of Shahn was created by Marvel Comics writer, David Michelinie.
